title: Robyn Preston
text:
Robyn Anne Preston is an Australian politician. She has been a member of the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Legislative%20Assembly">New South Wales Legislative Assembly</a> since 2019, representing <a href="Electoral%20district%20of%20Hawkesbury">Hawkesbury</a> for the <a href="Liberal%20Party%20of%20Australia%20%28New%20South%20Wales%20Division%29">Liberal Party</a>. Her Electorate Office is situated within the grounds of Western Sydney University in Richmond.
Preston served on <a href="The%20Hills%20Shire">The Hills Shire Council</a> for ten years, including a period as Deputy Mayor, and was also Australia's first female <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> commentator on commercial television.
